Hi All,

Hope all is well with you and loved ones. [Rackedge.in](https://www.rackedge.in/ "Rackedge.in") is a trusted hosting provider that provides web hosting services of all types. Our goal is to offer the best quality service that fits all your needs, either professional or personal.

**Deals Use coupon: "OFFER10" during checkout and get 10% OFF on your first month!**

Looking for a small, fast and reliable VPS? This package might be the one for you. Today, we want to offer you some small budget VPS.

**What We Offer**
* Basic DDoS Protection
* rDNS Service
* 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
* SolusVM Control Panel
* 24x7 HelpDesk Support
* PayPal, Credit/Debit Cards and other Payment Methods

**Frequently Asked Questions**
1. Is VPN allowed? - Yes, for personal use.
2. Is TUN/TAP/PPP enabled? - Yes.
3. Is adult hosting allowed? - No.
4. Which is the DC : OVH
5. Can I add extra IP addresses? - Yes, you can order them additionally.
6. Where are the Locations: London, UK
7. Looking Glass : http://51.195.146.211/LookingGlass/

We look forward to work with you! If you have any questions, please do get in touch with us, and we’ll be happy to assist! Contact us via info@rackedge.in or via our contact form through Website!

We look forward to welcoming you as a valued client!
[www.rackedge.in](https://www.rackedge.in/ "www.rackedge.in")
